tagline.en: Dedicated to becoming the best witness node.
tagline.zh: 致力于成为最好的见证人节点。

introduce.en: The EOSpace team core initiating members consist of a number of traditional Internet giants, including the founder of the Nasdaq listed company, the vice president of the A-share listed company, the technical leader of the Unicorn project, and the important code on the github of EOS.IO. Contributors, and distributed throughout the world: China, Singapore, the United States, Europe, etc. Details of specific core team members can be found on the official website: http://www.eospace.io
introduce.zh: EOSpace团队核心发起成员由多位传统互联网的大佬组成，里头包含纳斯达克上市公司创始人，A股上市公司副总裁，独角兽项目技术负责人，EOS.IO的github上的重要代码贡献者，并分布于全球各地：中国，新加坡，美国，欧洲等。具体核心团队成员介绍详见官网：http://www.eospace.io
